summary:
Remember when you love to find new weapons for its improvement. I do not.
A classical system of weapons, armors later, it is this mod.
descriptionHtml:
I am not native english

REQUERIMENTS: Dawnguard



NEW VERSION V2
----------------------
No changes at perks, overall reduced weapon damage, down to 10 levels of weapons of 12.
The middle image corresponds to the V2, and the image on the right corresponds to V1.


VERSION V1
----------------
Scale Weapon damage increased over V2, but Armsman, Barbarian and Overdraw for each level increase only 8% instead of 20% of vanilla.


SHORT DESCRIPTION
----------------------------
Remember when you love to find new weapons for its improvement. I do not.
A classic system of weapons, armors later, it is this mod.
Why there are so many weapons if they not invite you to use them?



LONG DESCRIPTION (V2)
---------------------------------
10 levels to unlock weapons, weapons are replics of the weapons in the game, so COMPATIBILITY IS PERFECT WITH ANY MOD.

Data on weapon damage(base damage), are all types of weapon, swords select as the most representative.

             Sword    Prize to unlock 
Iron            11    ------            800                    
Steel           15   ------           1500
Orcish         20   ------            2500
Dwarven       26    ------           3500
Elven           33    ------           5000
Glass           40     ------          7000
Ebony         50    ------           9000
Daedric        60    ------          12000
Dragon        70    ------          15000
Artifact       80   ------           25000
      

*Prize to Unlock, is not the prize of the weapon, only allows access to seller.
The prizes equivalent price around the maces of their materials in vanilla game.

To Reference, weapons(base damage) in the vanilla game:
Iron        8
Elven      11
Daedric  14

My weapons:

*Can not be improved in Whetstone.
*Can not forge.


WHERE ARE THE WEAPONS?
-------------------------------------
In Warmaiden\\\'s, in Whiterun. This upon entering, looking left, a trapdoor. See captures.


PROBLEMS
--------------
The only one, you have what save game and then load to see NPC dialogue, is a thing of CK, not mine.
The only important thing to say is that let the gold in the chest to get the key, you can leave more money what the indicated (800 gold in the first chest).



IN THE FUTURE
--------------------
My intention is to continue with the armor. And of course, getting the right balance.


Suggestions and tips are welcome!



Para usuarios españoles
---------------------------------
http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?/topic/70938-mis-mods-de-skyrim/
Aqui podreís encontrar la info del mod en castellano.
author: jalmpitt
